posts.post_content:
So, I was making an [Experiment Kraj](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Experiment Kraj) EDH deck, and I went to look through gatherer of all the nice activated abilities that he could borrow. This card popped up, and I decided to give it a shot. This licid is INCREDIBLE. It dodges so many attempts to remove it, and most of the other attempts that would kill it (such as [Maelstrom Pulse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Maelstrom Pulse) were countered. One of the only ways to truly remove this is a board wipe or a spell that sacrifices as a cost. I can honestly say I won games solely off the back of this card.   
  
5/5 without a doubt.
